participant_1.background: i started playing guitar when i was three. i grew up in the industry. we spent summers ring at national parks. i'm a country music singer.

participant_2.background: i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue.
